remarks: Properties that determine an orthomodular lattice.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isomli.0 $e |- K e. OL $.
isomli.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
isomli.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
isomli.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
isomli.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
isomli.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
isomli.7 $e |- ( ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> ( x .<_ y -> y = ( x .\/ ( y ./\ ( ._|_ ` x ) ) ) ) ) $.
isomliN $p |- K e. OML $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
